EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Invite #3
EmailTemplate.subject: CF Summit - Meet our Speakers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
There's only one week left to take advantage of Early Bird Pricing <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/register> for this year’s Cloud Foundry Summit <cfsummit.com> on June 9-11 in San Francisco! Register now for three days of discussion, technical sessions and workshops with other dedicated community members. Be a part of this year's premier event to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Source Platform-as-a-Service.
Here are some of the great breakout sessions <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/schedule> featured on our agenda:
- Nick Quinlin, SendGrid: Sending Emails Reliably and Quickly from Your CloudFoundry App with SendGrid - Christophe Levesque, AppDirect: How we Migrated to the V2 Cloud Foundry Service Broker by AppDirect - Harpreet Singh, CloudBees: Jenkins Enterprise and Operations Center and BOSH+PCF
Check out the agenda <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/schedule> to see our growing list of speakers and informative sessions. There is still time to submit a topic <http://cfsummit.com/#submissions> or suggest a discussion that you would like to share with the Cloud Foundry community.
Sponsorship opportunities <http://cfsummit.com/#contact-us> are still available for this premier event. Please inquire if you’re interested.
We look forward to seeing you at the Summit!
Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
